name: Greatsword
inventoryDescription: A shining sword of the finest metal
groundDescription: There's a sword on the ground; shining brilliantly in the sunlight

actions.name: Light Attack
actions.description: Swing the sword about and hope to hit something...
actions.executeDescription: You slash the sword about while eating a burrito. You manage to drop the burrito in the eyes of your enemy. They take damage

actions.name: Heavy Attack
actions.description: Swing the greatsword with all your might
actions.executeDescription: You bring the greatsword down on the enemy with all your force!

actions.name: Throw Sword
actions.description: Throw the sword at an enemy with great force
actions.executeDescription: You grip the sword tightly and lunge it at the enemy with all your might!

actions.name: Stabby
actions.description: Stabs the other guy with the force of a whole sword, and your wimpy arms
actions.executeDescription: You push very hard, while looking away. Garsh, there's blood on your body!
